clauses.title: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that may keep logs indefinitely, allowing user sessions to be tracked over time. Logs that are kept for a time "consistent with applicable law" also fall under this case, since this period of time may be murky or undefined.
clauses.clause_text: Our servers keep log files

case.text: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text:
We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these
Terms at any time.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text:
We may terminate your account immediately for any reason whatsoever, but as
we value our users, we will normally not do so as long as you comply with
these Terms.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected
clauses.description: Users agree to use the service and its software as provided and accept that any errors within that software may not be corrected.
clauses.clause_text: any errors or defects will be corrected

case.text: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected

clauses.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
clauses.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.
clauses.clause_text:
If available from
GitHub, we collect and store: avatar, name, first name, last name, bio, email
and username and -id.

case.text: Information is gathered about you through third parties

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text:
By continuing to access or use our Service after the revisions to the Terms
become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: Full quote: "We will not sell, rent or lease your personal data to anyone, except in case we sell our business or part thereof to another company."

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: Your profile is combined across various products
clauses.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.
clauses.clause_text:
Marketing.
We may use any combination of services in order to enhance what we
know about you for the sole purpose of providing tips on how to use CodeSandbox

case.text: Your profile is combined across various products

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for unauthorized access to your personal information
clauses.clause_text: Full quote: "In no event shall CodeSandbox, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from... unauthorized access, use or alteration of your transmissions or content"

case.text: This service assumes no liability for unauthorized access to your personal information

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text:
Your personal data may be transferred, stored and processed in the European
Economic Area (“EEA”), United States (“US”) or any other country in which our
service providers maintain facilities.

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: You shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service
clauses.description:
Users are asked not to interfere with another person't enjoyment in using the service.
However, this statement is very vague and open to interpretation by the service itself.
clauses.clause_text:
harass or interfere with any other user’s use and enjoyment
of the Service

case.text: You shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text:
We allow some of our service providers such as Google
Analytics, Amplitude, Algolia and Vero to store cookies on your device.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: Third party cookies are employed, but with opt out instructions
clauses.clause_text:
We
assume you know what cookies are and how to prevent third parties from
installing cookies on your device.
If not, your browser settings allow you to
disable cookies and control acceptance levels.
Please reach out to us via
details below if you are in doubt or seek assistance in understanding and
changing browser settings.

case.text: Third party cookies are employed, but with opt out instructions

clauses.title: Content is published under a free license instead of a bilateral one
clauses.description: User-generated content, such as posts or comments, is published under a free license, meaning other users can reuse it (e.g. Creative Commons license).
clauses.clause_text: if you choose certain license terms for your public Sandbox, these license terms have to allow for forking. Basically, this means open source licensing, and you decide the type of open source license.

case.text: Content is published under a free license instead of a bilateral one

clauses.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
clauses.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.
clauses.clause_text: Data types we are collecting and using

case.text: Information is provided about how they collect personal data

clauses.title: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time
clauses.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.
clauses.clause_text: Click here for previous versions of our Terms of Use.

case.text: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time

clauses.title: You can scrape the site, as long as it doesn't impact the server too much
clauses.description: Automated web scraping is a method of extracting information from a website. The service authorises scraping if it doesn't impact its server(s) too much.
clauses.clause_text:
interfere with,
disrupt, or create an undue burden on servers or networks connected to the
Service, or violate the regulations, policies or procedures of such
networks.

case.text: You can scrape the site, as long as it doesn't impact the server too much

clauses.title: No need to register
clauses.description: This service can be used without providing a user profile.
clauses.clause_text:
Some parts of the Service are only available to you if you have a
CodeSandbox Account.

case.text: No need to register

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.clause_text: These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of the Netherlands.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text:
We will not retain your personal data for a period longer than necessary to
fulfill the purposes described in this policy, unless we have to keep it for
legitimate tax, business or legal purposes.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:

clauses.title: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.
clauses.description: The Service provides a list detailing the third parties involved, their roles, and may even provide more information.
clauses.clause_text:
Sub-processors &. Data locations

Syntax: (Company Name (“a.k.a.”), Location, Purpose, Link)

  • Amplitude, Inc. United States. Data Analysis. https://amplitude.com/blog/one-year-after-gdpr-amplitude-and-user-privacy;
  • Amazon, Inc., AWS EMEA SARL. United States &. European Union. Hosting services. https://aws.amazon.com/compliance/gdpr-center/;
  • Cloudflare, Inc. United States &. European Union. Routing, securing and caching web traffic. https://www.cloudflare.com/privacypolicy/;
  • Google Ireland Limited (“Google Cloud Platform”). United States &. European Union. Hosting services. https://policies.google.com/privacy;
  • Google LLC, Google Ireland Limited or affiliate (“Google Analytics”). Data Analysis. https://support.google.com/analytics/answer/9019185?hl=en;
  • Hetzner Online GmbH Gunzenhausen. Germany. Hosting services. https://wiki.hetzner.de/index.php/Datenschutz-FAQ/en;
  • Invc.me, Inc. (“Vero”). United States. Behavior based email campaigns. https://www.getvero.com/gdpr/;
  • Mailgun, Inc. United States. Email Service Provider. https://www.mailgun.com/gdpr/
  • Stripe Payments Europe, Ltd. European Union. Payment Service Provider. https://stripe.com/privacy-center/legal;
  • The Rocket Science Group LLC (“Mailchimp”). United States. Email Service Provider. https://mailchimp.com/gdpr/.
